snippet: Crédit Lyonnais, a French bank, will pay $150 million to settle a suit filed by the American International Group’s SunAmerica unit over its 1993 investment in a California insurance company.
lead_paragraph: Crédit Lyonnais, a French bank, will pay $150 million to settle a suit filed by the American International Group’s SunAmerica unit over its 1993 investment in a California insurance company.

headline.main: A.I.G. Unit and a French Bank Settle a Lawsuit
